location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to Government, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is conveying a request from William Bruce that due to the service he has rendered as Acting Resident, and his twelve years of service at Bushire, he be permitted to draw on a monthly allowance granted to the Bushire Residency from the date Nicholas Hankey Smith ceased to do so.
